DOC.brief_summary: Subjects were asked to come to the Purdue facilities after an overnight fast on 2 different testing days for 2.5 hours each day. On one day the subjects participated in blood pressure and body weight measurements as well as a muscle biopsy from the thigh. On the second day the subjects underwent an MRI and MRS scan of the thigh and calf.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Muscle Fat Accumulation on the Genomic Profile of Skeletal Muscle in Older Adults
DOC.criteria: 6080 years old, men and women, normal body weight or obese, Certain medical conditions could have placed them at risk
